In this folder are reproduced the licenses for the third party libraries used in this software:
  * libantlr3c: ANTLR3 c runtime library
  * vmath: computer graphics math library
  * Xercesc: Xerces C XML parser
  * cairo & pixman: 2D graphics library. Modified source code used in this software can be found here: https://github.com/bluecataudio/cairo
  * glew: openGL wrapper library.
  * libpng: png image format.
  * libsamplerate: audio resampling.
  * portaudio: audio I/O library.
  * taglib: audio file meta-data.
